    • Method Detail

      • optimize

        public boolean optimize​(java.util.List<Server> server,
                        java.util.List<Service> services)
        This method executes an internal DC optimization. This comprises VM allocations to as few as possible servers and switching off unused servers.
        Parameters:
        server - The list of all servers in a DC
        services - The list of all services located in a DC
        Returns:
        True if the optimization was successful; false otherwise.

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull​(java.util.List<Server> server,
                      java.util.List<Service> services)
        This method checks if all services can be allocated in a DC or not.
        Parameters:
        server - The list of all servers in a DC
        services - The list of all services located in a DC
        Returns:
        True if the data center is full, that means the VMs could NOT all be allocated; false if all VMs could be allocated
